title:
why haven\'t you answered my question about the developer who is suing New Hanover County over a Board of Comm. ruling on a zoning change??



I sent it to you almost 3 months ago.Do you only answer the easy ones???
text:
I
apologize for any delay we might have caused, but I don't see your
question in our system. Can you send me more details, such as the name
of the developer?
